item.name: Registration - Step 1: Create User & Get OTP

request.description: User fills signup form and clicks 'Get Code'. User is CREATED immediately and OTP is sent (123456 in dev).
Parent user enters OTP and clicks 'Sign up'. Verifies phone and logs in user with JWT token. appType must be 'parent'.

Send OTP to existing parent user's phone for login (first time). appType must be 'parent' for parent app.

Validation:
- User must exist
- No existing unexpired OTP (use resend-otp if OTP already sent)

Resend OTP to parent user's phone.

Validation:
- User must exist
- Must have called send-otp first
- 1 minute cooldown between resends
- Max 5 resend attempts per hour

Response includes remainingAttempts count.
Parent user enters OTP and logs in. appType must be 'parent' for parent app.
Send password reset email to parent.
Reset parent password using token.
Logout parent and blacklist token.
Get logged-in user's profile information. Works for both Parent and Medical Staff. Endpoint returns user-type specific data.

Update parent profile information. This is a unified endpoint - same endpoint works for Medical Staff with their specific fields (see Update Profile (Medical Staff Example)). All fields are optional. Only send the fields you want to update. profilePhoto: URL of the uploaded image (upload file first using Upload Profile Photo API, then use the returned URL here)

item.name: Registration - Step 1: Create User & Get OTP

request.description: User fills signup form and clicks 'Get Code'. User is CREATED immediately and OTP is sent (123456 in dev).

exec: console.log('‚úÖ Medical staff verified & logged in!');

request.description: User enters OTP and clicks 'Sign up'. Uses SAME endpoint as Parent. Verifies phone and logs in user with JWT token. appType must be 'staff' for medical staff.

Send OTP to existing medical staff's phone for login (first time). appType must be 'staff'.

Validation:
- User must exist
- No existing unexpired OTP (use resend-otp if OTP already sent)

Resend OTP to medical staff's phone.

Validation:
- User must exist
- Must have called send-otp first
- 1 minute cooldown between resends
- Max 5 resend attempts per hour

Response includes remainingAttempts count.
User enters OTP and logs in. appType must be 'staff' for medical staff.
Send password reset email to medical staff.
Reset medical staff password using token.
Logout medical staff and blacklist token.
Get logged-in user's profile information. Works for both Parent and Medical Staff. Endpoint returns user-type specific data.

Update medical staff profile information. This is a unified endpoint - same endpoint works for Parents with their specific fields (see Update Profile (Parent Example)). All fields are optional. Only send the fields you want to update. profilePhoto: URL of the uploaded image (upload file first using Upload Profile Photo API, then use the returned URL here)

request.description: Get parent statistics including total parents, active parents, verified parents, total children, and average children per parent.

{
  "parentName": "Jane Smith",
  "age": 32,
  "gender": "FEMALE",

  "emergencyContactPhone": "9876543221",

  "registrationTime": "14:30",
  "status": "ACTIVE",
  "medicalHistory": "No known allergies",
  "notes": "First time registration"
}

request.description:
Create a new parent with all details.

**Personal Info (Required):**
- parentName: Full name
- numberOfChildren: At least 1
- relationWithChild: Mother, Father, Guardian, etc.

**Personal Info (Optional):**
- age, gender, dateOfBirth, bloodGroup, profilePhoto

**Contact & Address (Required):**
- phone, email, address, city, state, pincode

**Contact & Address (Optional):**
- dialCode (default +91), password (default Parent@123)
- emergencyContactName, emergencyContactPhone

**Medical & Notes (Optional):**
- registrationDate, registrationTime, lastVisitDate, lastVisitTime
- status, medicalHistory, notes

query.description: Search by parentName, email, or phone
Filter by status: ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED, DELETED

request.description:
Get all parents with pagination and filters.

Filters:
- search: by parentName, email, or phone
- status: ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED, DELETED
- city: Filter by city
- state: Filter by state

Response includes all parent fields + children/appointments count.
Get parent details by ID. Response includes parent info with children list.

body.raw:
{
  "parentName": "Jane Smith Updated",
  "age": 33,
  "gender": "FEMALE",
  "dateOfBirth": "1992-05-15",
  "bloodGroup": "O_POSITIVE",
  "numberOfChildren": 3,
  "relationWithChild": "Mother",
  "phone": "9876543222",
  "email": "jane.updated@example.com",
  "address": "456 New Street",
  "city": "Surat",
  "state": "Gujarat",
  "pincode": "395001",
  "emergencyContactName": "John Smith",
  "emergencyContactPhone": "9876543223",
  "lastVisitDate": "2025-12-15",
  "lastVisitTime": "10:30",
  "status": "ACTIVE",
  "medicalHistory": "No allergies, recently recovered from flu",
  "notes": "Updated contact information"
}

request.description:
Update parent information. All fields are optional.

**Personal Info:**
- parentName, age, gender, dateOfBirth, bloodGroup
- numberOfChildren, relationWithChild, profilePhoto

**Contact & Address:**
- phone, dialCode, email, address, city, state, pincode
- emergencyContactName, emergencyContactPhone

**Medical & Notes:**
- registrationDate, registrationTime, lastVisitDate, lastVisitTime
- status, medicalHistory, notes
Soft delete a parent. Cannot delete if parent has active appointments.

query.description: Optional: Filter stats by vaccination center

request.description: Get appointment statistics. Optionally filter by clinicId.
Create appointment as admin. No validation - can create for any parent/child. All IDs must exist.

query.description: Search by child name, parent name, vaccine name, or verification code

request.description: Get all appointments with filters and pagination.
Get appointment details by ID.
Update appointment. All fields optional: childId, parentId, clinicId, vaccineId, scheduledDate, scheduledTime, medicalStaffId, status, notes.
Delete appointment. Cannot delete if appointment has vaccination record.

Get all vaccination centers with pagination and filters
Get vaccination center details by ID with medical staff list

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Primary Health Center - Ahmedabad (Updated)",
  "phone": "9876543211",
  "openingHours": "8:00 AM - 7:00 PM (Mon-Sat)",
  "facilities": "Cold Storage, Emergency Care, Laboratory, Ambulance",
  "status": "ACTIVE"
}

request.description: Update vaccination center details. All fields are optional.
Toggle vaccination center between active and inactive status
Get vaccination center statistics including appointments, staff, and inventory counts
Soft delete vaccination center (marks as inactive). Cannot delete if center has active appointments.
Get inventory statistics (total items, active, low stock, expired, out of stock). Optional clinicId filter.
Get list of inventory items with LOW_STOCK or OUT_OF_STOCK status
Get list of expired vaccine inventory items
Create new vaccine inventory/stock entry. Status is auto-calculated based on quantity and expiry date.

response.name: success

body.raw:
{
  "vaccineId": "{{vaccine_id}}",
  "clinicId": "{{vaccination_center_id}}",
  "batchNumber": "BCG2024A001",

request.description: Add a new child. Requires PARENT authentication. firstName is optional for newborns. allergies and medicalConditions are arrays of strings.
Get all children for logged-in parent
Get specific child details
Update child information. All fields are optional. allergies and medicalConditions are arrays of strings. profilePhoto: URL of the uploaded image.
Soft delete child (sets isActive to false)

Mark multiple vaccinations as complete for a child.

üéØ WHO CAN USE: PARENTS ONLY

üìã PURPOSE: Mark birth vaccines (0-30 days) as complete during registration

RESTRICTIONS:
- Only PARENT users can use this API
- Only vaccines scheduled for 0-30 days (first month/birth vaccines) can be marked complete by parents
- Vaccines beyond 30 days require medical staff to complete

Request Body:
- childId: UUID of the child
- scheduleIds: Array of vaccine schedule IDs from vaccination plan

Response includes:
- totalRequested: Number of vaccines requested to mark complete
- completedCount: Number successfully marked
- failedCount: Number that failed
- completed: Array of successfully marked vaccinations
- failed: Array of failed vaccinations with reasons

formdata.description: Select image file (JPEG, PNG, WebP, max 5MB)
URL of old profile photo to delete (optional). Example: http://localhost:3000/uploads/profile-photos/abc123.jpg

request.description: Upload profile photo for authenticated user (Parent or Medical Staff). Returns only the image URL. Response: { status: 'success', message: 'Profile photo uploaded successfully', data: { imageUrl: 'http://...' } }. Old photo is automatically deleted if removeImage is provided.

formdata.description: Select multiple files (Images: JPEG, PNG, WebP; Videos: MP4, MPEG, MOV, AVI, WebM. Max 20 files, 50MB each)

request.description: Upload multiple images and videos. Response separates images and videos with URLs.

- Staff: staffRoles, employmentStatuses, userStatuses
- Appointment: appointmentStatuses
- Vaccine: vaccineTypes, administrationRoutes, vialTypes, vaccineCategories, openedVialStatuses, dosageUnits, storageTemperatures, vaccineAgeGroups

query.description: Returns full details for mobile app UI

request.description:
Get vaccine details formatted for mobile app UI.

Returns:
- vaccineInfo: Basic info (name, type, category, route)
- description: Full description
- whyThisVaccine: Benefits list
- risksIfNotTaken: Risks list
- globalCoverage: Coverage percentages with chart data
- goodHealthRatio: Fully/Partially/Unvaccinated percentages
- recommendedSchedule: Dose schedule with ages
- additionalInfo: Side effects, contraindications, storage
- stats: Vaccination statistics

request.description:
Get ALL vaccination data (no status parameter).

Response:
{
  "statistics": {...},
  "pendingVaccines": [...],
  "upcomingVaccines": [...],
  "completedVaccines": [...]
}

Use for: Loading all data at once, then filter on frontend.

Get ONLY pending vaccines.

Response:
{
  "status": "pending",
  "statistics": {...},
  "pendingVaccines": [...]
}

Array name matches status: pendingVaccines

Get ONLY upcoming vaccines (next 30 days).

Response:
{
  "status": "upcoming",
  "statistics": {...},
  "upcomingVaccines": [...]
}

Array name matches tab: upcomingVaccines

Get ONLY completed vaccines.

Response:
{
  "status": "completed",
  "statistics": {...},
  "completedVaccines": [...]
}

Array name matches status: completedVaccines
Get educational articles.
Get article details.

query.description: Specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional, defaults to today)
Filter by status: pending | upcoming | start_visit | check_in | completed | cancelled | in_progress (or direct: SCHEDULED, CONFIRMED, etc.)

request.description:
Get appointments for medical staff's vaccination center.

Query Parameters:
- date: Specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional). If not provided, returns next 30 days from today.
- status: Filter by status (optional):
  - 'pending' - SCHEDULED, CONFIRMED (not started)
  - 'upcoming' - SCHEDULED only
  - 'start_visit' - START_VISIT
  - 'check_in' - CHECK_IN
  - 'completed' - COMPLETED
  - 'cancelled' - CANCELLED
  - 'in_progress' - CHECK_IN, START_VISIT (visit started)
  - Or direct status values (SCHEDULED, CONFIRMED, etc.)

Returns:
- dateRange: { from, to } - Date range of the query
- vaccinationCenter: Staff's assigned center
- statistics: { total, completed, pending }
- appointments: Array with verificationCode, child, vaccine, vaccinationCenter, parent, medicalStaff, status

Used by: Medical Staff App - Appointments list screen with calendar

Start visit - marks appointment as START_VISIT and assigns current medical staff.

Request Body:
- status: "start_visit" (required)

Actions:
- Updates status to START_VISIT
- Assigns current medical staff to appointment

Used by: Medical Staff App - 'Start Visit' button on appointment list and details screen

Check in patient - marks appointment as CHECK_IN.

Request Body:
- status: "check_in" (required)

Actions:
- Updates status to CHECK_IN
- Assigns current medical staff to appointment

Used by: Medical Staff App - Check in flow (backward compatibility)

request.description:
Complete vaccination (check out) - marks appointment as COMPLETED and creates vaccination record.

Request Body:
- status: "check_out" (required)
- verificationCode: 4-digit code from parent (required) - validates appointment completion
- batchNumber (optional): Vaccine batch number
- reactions (optional): Any adverse reactions observed
- notes (optional): Additional notes

Actions:
- Validates the 4-digit verification code from parent
- Updates appointment status to COMPLETED
- Creates VaccinationRecord in database
- Associates medical staff with the record
- Records batch number, reactions, and notes

Used by: Medical Staff App - Complete vaccination flow

response.name: invalid batch number

body.raw:
{
  "status": "check_out",
  "verificationCode": "2388",
  "batchNumber": "BCG2024A01",
  "reactions": "No adverse reactions",
  "notes": "Vaccination completed successfully. Child was comfortable throughout the procedure."
}

request.description:
Cancel an appointment by medical staff.

Request Body:
- reason (required): Reason for cancellation
- notes (optional): Additional notes

Actions:
- Updates appointment status to CANCELLED
- Records cancellation reason
- Associates medical staff who cancelled

Validations:
- Cannot cancel already completed appointments
- Cannot cancel already cancelled appointments
- Reason is required

Returns:
- appointment: { id, status, cancellationReason, child, vaccine, vaccinationCenter, scheduledDate, scheduledTime, cancelledBy }

Used by: Medical Staff App - Cancel appointment button

query.description: Search by child name or vaccine name (optional)

request.description:
Get vaccination records (completed visits history).

Returns:
- totalRecords: Total count of completed vaccinations
- records: Array of completed vaccinations with:
  - child: { name, age, ageLabel, profilePhoto }
  - vaccine: { name, doseLabel, ageGroupLabel }
  - dueDateTime, scheduledDate, scheduledTime
  - location (Clinic Visit)
  - status, completedAt
  - vaccinationRecord: { doseNumber, administeredDate, batchNumber, reactions, notes }

Used by: Medical Staff App - Records screen

query.description: Search by vaccine name or batch number (optional)

request.description:
Get vaccine inventory for the medical staff's vaccination center.

Returns:
- vaccinationCenter: { id, name }
- statistics: { totalItems, inStock, lowStock, outOfStock, expired }
- inventory: Array with:
  - vaccine: { id, name, manufacturer }
  - currentStock: quantity
  - batchNumber
  - expiryDate, expiresOn (formatted)
  - status, statusLabel (In Stock, Low Stock, etc.)

Used by: Medical Staff App - Inventory screen

Submit a request for new vaccine stock.

Request Body:
- vaccineName (required): Name of vaccine needed
- vaccineType (optional): Type of vaccine
- quantity (required): Number of units needed
- preferredDeliveryDate (optional): Preferred delivery date

Actions:
- Creates stock request with PENDING status
- Admin can approve/reject from admin panel

Used by: Medical Staff App - Request New Stock screen

Get history of submitted stock requests.

Returns:
- totalRequests: Total count
- requests: Array of stock requests with:
  - vaccineName, vaccineType, quantity
  - preferredDeliveryDate
  - status (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, FULFILLED)
  - adminNotes, rejectionReason
  - createdAt, approvedAt, rejectedAt, fulfilledAt

Used by: Medical Staff App - View submitted stock requests

Book a new appointment. Validates child ownership, clinic/vaccine active status, and slot availability. Auto-saves appointment_id to collection variable.

Response includes:
- verificationCode: 4-digit code (e.g., '5821') - Parent must provide this code to medical staff at check-out for appointment completion

query.description: Filter: pending | completed | upcoming | SCHEDULED | CONFIRMED | COMPLETED | CANCELLED

request.description:
Get all appointments for logged-in user (Parent or Medical Staff).

Status filters:
- 'pending' - SCHEDULED, CONFIRMED, CHECK_IN, START_VISIT
- 'completed' - COMPLETED only
- 'upcoming' - SCHEDULED only
- Or direct status values

Defaults to next 30 days if no date range provided.

Response:
- PARENT: { count, appointments }
- MEDICAL_STAFF: { dateRange, statistics, appointments }

Each appointment includes verificationCode (4-digit code for check-out validation)

Get detailed appointment information by ID. Used for confirmation screen with child, clinic, vaccine, and medical staff details.

Response includes:
- verificationCode: 4-digit code for appointment verification at check-out
Reschedule an existing appointment to a new date and time. Validates new slot availability. Cannot reschedule cancelled or completed appointments.
Cancel an appointment. Changes status to CANCELLED. Cannot cancel already cancelled or completed appointments.

Parent acknowledges/marks appointment as complete. Only allowed if medical staff has already completed the appointment (status = COMPLETED).

Sets isParentAcknowledged = true and parentAcknowledgedAt = current timestamp.

Returns:
- appointment: Updated appointment with child, vaccine, center, and vaccination record details

Error cases:
- 404: Appointment not found
- 400: Medical staff has not completed this appointment yet
- 400: Appointment already marked as complete by you

Get all data needed for parent dashboard screen in a single API call.

Returns:
- parent: Parent info (id, name, photo)
- children: List of all children with age
- selectedChild: Selected child with vaccination summary (completed, nextDue, pending)
- bookedAppointments: Upcoming appointments with vaccine, center, doctor info
- remainingVaccines: Pending vaccines with due dates and status
- healthRatio: Global health ratio (protected vs at-risk percentage)
- knowledgeBase: Educational articles

Used by: Parent App - Dashboard/Home screen

query.description: Optional: Child ID to select specific child

request.description:
Get dashboard data for a specific child.

Query Parameters:
- childId (optional): UUID of the child to display data for

If childId is not provided, defaults to the first child.

Used by: Parent App - Dashboard/Home screen when switching between children

Get vaccination insights and analytics data for dashboard charts.

Returns:
- healthRatio: Protected vs At Risk percentage
- globalCoverage: Fully/Partially/Unvaccinated counts (for pie chart)
- vaccineWiseCoverage: Coverage by vaccine (for bar chart)
- demographicsCoverage: Coverage by gender - boys/girls (for bar chart)

Used by: Mobile app Insights screen

Get vaccination insights for a specific vaccination center.

Returns:
- totalChildrenServed: Unique children who visited
- totalAppointments: Total appointments count
- completedAppointments: Completed count
- completionRate: Percentage of completed appointments
- vaccineWiseCoverage: Vaccines administered at this clinic

Used by: Admin panel - Clinic dashboard

request.description:
Create a new vaccine supplier with complete details including:
- Basic Info: name, code, contact person, phone, email
- Address: full address, city, state, pincode
- Legal & Banking: GST, PAN, license, bank details
- Financial: payment terms, credit limit
- Vaccine Details: types supplied, storage conditions, capacity

Get all suppliers with pagination and filters.

Filters:
- search: Search by name, code, email, phone
- status: ACTIVE, EXPIRED, LOW_STOCK, OUT_OF_STOCK, QUARANTINE
- city: Filter by city
- state: Filter by state
Get complete details of a specific supplier by ID.
Update supplier details. All fields are optional - only send fields you want to update.
Toggle supplier status between ACTIVE and OUT_OF_STOCK.

Get supplier statistics:
- Total suppliers count
- Active suppliers count
- Inactive suppliers count
- Suppliers by state distribution
Get active suppliers for dropdown selection. Returns minimal data: id, label (name), code, location.
Permanently delete a supplier.

Create a new admin user.

Required fields:
- fullName: Full name of the user
- email: Email address (must be unique)
- role: SUPER_ADMIN or ADMIN

Optional fields:
- password: Default is Admin@123
- status: ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED (default: ACTIVE)
- phone: Phone number
- profilePhoto: URL to profile picture

query.description: Filter by status: ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED, DELETED

request.description:
Get all admin users with pagination and filters.

Filters:
- search: Search by fullName or email
- status: ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED, DELETED
- role: SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN
Get complete details of a specific admin user by ID.

Update admin user details. All fields are optional - only send fields you want to update.

Updatable fields:
- fullName
- email
- password (will be hashed)
- role: SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN
- status: ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED
- phone
- profilePhoto

Soft delete an admin user. Sets status to DELETED and marks isDeleted flag.

Note: You cannot delete your own account.
